item.title:
The cast of @A24 ’s ‘MOTHER MARY’ from filmmaker David Lowery.
Described as an epic pop melodrama following a fictional musician and her relationship with an iconic fashion designer.

item.title:
NEON has now won the Palme d’Or four consecutive times in a row.
• Parasite dir. Bong Joon-ho • Titane dir. Julia Ducournau • Triangle of Sadness dir. Ruben Östlund • Anatomy of a Fall dir. Justine Triet
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Justine Triet’s ‘ANATOMY OF A FALL’ wins the Palme d’Or at the 76th Cannes Film Festival.
